title: Heart Song
description: Relena wants freedom, depending on herself and not having to answer to anyone, but a betrayal takes that away. The last thing she expected was the incredibly handsome Marren to free her.The catch?She has to fall in love with him, fulfill a prophecy involving their heart song, and rejoin the two realms. But Jiren, the last Ancient of his kind, isnâ€™t convinced and will stop at nothing to maintain his throne, even if it means breaking their most sacred law.
author: Samantha LaFantasie
